tit.j: 宗我坐宗我都比古神社
tit.cmt: 「Sogani imasu sogatsuhiko-jinja shrine」を「Sogani masu sogatsuhiko-jinja Shrine」に修正しました。

sen.j: 宗我坐宗我都比古神社（そがにますそがつひこじんじゃ）は奈良県橿原市曽我町に鎮座する神社である。
sen.e: Sogani imasu sogatsuhiko-jinja is a Shinto Shrine located in Soga-cho, Kashimara City, Nara Prefecture.
Sogani imasu sogatsuhiko-jinja is a Shinto Shrine located in Soga-cho, Kashimara City, Nara Prefecture.
Sogani masu sogatsuhiko-jinja is a Shinto Shrine located in Soga-cho, Kashimara City, Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 「Sogani imasu sogatsuhiko-jinja」を「Sogani masu sogatsuhiko-jinja 」に修正しました。

sen.e: Sogatsuhiko Okami (the Great God of Sogatuskiko)
Sogatsuhiko Okami (the Great God of Sogatuskiko)
Sogatsuhiko Okami (the Great God of Sogatsuhiko)

sen.j: 推古天皇の御宇、本地を拠点とする蘇我馬子が氏祖である石川宿禰夫妻を祀ったことを起源とする。
sen.e: Its origin dates back to the reign of Emperor Suiko, when SOGA no Umako based on this place, enshrined Ishikawa no sukune and his wife, who were his ancestors.
The shrine dates back to the reign of Emperor Suiko, when SOGA no Umako who was based in the area, enshrined his ancestor Ishikawa no sukune and Ishikawa's wife.
sen.cmt: Its origin > the shrine. based on this place > basied in the area.
sen.e: The shrine dates back to the reign of Emperor Suiko, when SOGA no Umako who was based in the area, enshrined his ancestor ISHIKAWA no Sukune and Ishikawa's wife.
sen.cmt: 「Ishikawa no sukune」を「ISHIKAWA no Sukune」に修正しました。

sen.j: 延喜式では式内社（大社）に列し、朝廷からの崇敬を受けていた。
sen.e: This temple was listed in Engishiki as Shikinaisha (a grand shirine), and worshipped by the Imperial Court.
This temple was listed in Engishiki as Shikinaisha (a grand shirine), and was worshipped by the Imperial Court.
This temple was listed in Engishiki as Shikinaisha (a grand shirine), and was worshipped by the Imperial Court.
Kinensai (prayer service for a good crop) Febrary 22
Kinensai (prayer service for a good crop) Febrary 22
Kinensai (prayer service for a good crop) Febrary 22

sen.cmt: 読み方不明のため漢字のままにしております。

sen.j: 近畿日本鉄道近鉄大阪線真菅駅、下車
sen.e: Take Kintetsu Osaka line and get off at Masuga Station.
Take the Kintetsu Osaka line and get off at Masuga Station.
Take the Kintetsu Osaka line and get off at Masuga Station.
